body.name: Lazyzizi Folding Mattress, 4 Inch Memory Foam Tri-fold Mattress with Breathable & Washable Bamboo Fiber Fabric Cover, Foldable Floor Mattress Guest Bed for Camping, Road Trip, Single
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 43 mins
features: Multifunctional Design: Lazyzizi convertible foldable mattress can be changed freely among lounge chair and bed to satisfy your different needs. Folding mattress portable makes it perfect for camping, yoga, sofa bed, spare bed, guest bed, dorm room, RV mattresses, and more. It is undoubtedly the ideal solution for small spaces.

Quick to Set up, Easy to Store: You can simply unfold the trifold mattress to relax at any time. The specially designed carrying handle allows you to easily move the foldable mattress with one hand. It also can be folded into a compact size and put into the included travel bag for space-saving when not in use. The bonus storage bag keeps it neat and secure during storage and transport.

No Risk & Durable: This foldable mattress bed is constructed with CertiPUR-US Certified and OEKO-TEX tested Foam. The floor mattress for adults is made of skin-friendly bamboo fiber fabric, The bottom has a non-slip cloth to prevent sliding during use. Coming with the smooth zipper, the cover of our trifold mattress can be quickly removed for easy washing.

Comfort & Support: Lazyzizi 4 inch portable mattress features a 2-Layer design. 1.5-inch memory foam can effectively relieve your body pressure, gives you a healthier and cloud-like experience; 2.5-inch upgraded assist foam has strong support, ensuring that the body is isolated from the floor, and wicks moisture away to keep you cool and comfortable overnight.

Buy With Confidence: Lazyzizi tri folding mattress is vacuum-packed for fast, damage-free . Please allow 48-72 hours for the memory foam camping mattress to expand fully. Lazyzizi Team's Message: Should you need service or support, start your request and we'll find you a solution.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Lazyzizi Yoga Chaise Lounge Normal Grey Lazyzizi Yoga Chaise Lounge Large Grey Includes Cover ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars YES THIS IS THE ONE. finally!!!
reviews.reviewText: update: my guest is 240 lbs / 5"11 and he said it's the most comfortable sleep he has had in a long time. I cannot wait to go camping with thisOriginal:I have been looking for some time for a mattress that makes sense to own and would last. The one I got today was very quality, very comfortable once it fully inflated, does not have a smell, and is good for tall people and broad shoulder people. the pieces all zip together/come apart and makes for easier storage. I am leaving a review because it has been impossible to find consistent reviews everywhere, and others' reviews of this product helped me make the choice after weeks of researching. i looked at w@l m@rt and other sporting goods stores and this, for me, is the winner. it can fit in the car too for longer drives or camping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable and super convenient
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I drove across country and back but didn’t want to pay for a hotel. This is a great car mattress for trips and camping and was my savior for those nightly parking lot naps. I stayed at my moms for a week and I opted to use this mattress over her guest bed which dipped in the middle and felt like a torture device. She should buy one of these too come to think of it.I now use it on my patio as a seat. The removable cover is easy to clean and I was surprised at how it didn’t look or feel any different after the wash. I used to have two of these from some other company that I used to rave about but this one is far superior. It’s softer material, has handles and a carrying case, and is twice as comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Camping, Guests, etc good mattress
reviews.reviewText: Firm but not uncomfortable when on the floor, easily folds & unfolds, hides under a bedGood play area for over age one with constant right next to you supervision if you have hardwood floors. Easy to put away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I slept two nights on it and it was so comfortable! I bought the 6 inch cushions that zip together to create a trifold bed. It has handles for carrying but no bag. I took a bungie cord, wrapped around the cushions to carry it around. All the cushions have additional zippers so the covers can be washed. It was extremely comfortable for me; I have arthritis in my left hip and a hip replacement in the right hip as well as a spinal fusion and radiculopathy. No pain! I just wish it had a bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars OH ITS SO GOOD
reviews.reviewText: So far no mold or tearing. Super comfortable, wider than I thought, very good length considering that my brother, who is using it, is 5'11. I like that they're 3 separate pieces so one can just move them and they're not really heavy separately either. The fitted sheets hold all pieces together really well, no issue of separation. I do think that the cover should've been included but whatever I guess 😂.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome compact mattress
reviews.reviewText: Love it. Very comfortable and easy to store away

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm so done with air mattresses and cut foam. This portable mattress is divine for resting and sleeping! The only downside is that it takes up a lot of storage space (for single sleeping approx. 40" x 24" x 14"), which IMHO is worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It folds nicely and comes with it's own storage bag!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my guests who sleep over and it works great. Its memory foam and very soft, although if you get hot at night this might not be for you.. If you lay on it long enough, you kind of "sink" into the mattress. It may not fit a very tall person, I'm 5'0 so it fit just right. I still loved it and it's better than the floor!
